posts.post_content:
Up for trade are three T205s - SGC 2.5 Karger (Piedmont), SGC 1.5 Charles Wagner (Cycle) & SGC 2 Kleinow (Hassan).
Open to ALL offers, really enjoy some trade chat. My "high-priority" list would include: Bob Gibson RC, 1941 Play Ball Ted, 1955 Topps Ted Williams, 1962 Topps Yaz, Clemente cards.

All 3 have been traded! Thanks!!
